starting_equipment: Light Crossbow and 20 bolts OR Any Simple Weapon
Leather Armor, Any Simple Weapon, and Two Daggers

level_1_features.name: Otherworldly Patron
level_1_features.description: You have struck a bargain with an otherworldly being. Choose a patron such as The Fiend, The Archfey, or The Great Old One.

level_1_features.name: Pact Magic
level_1_features.description: Your arcane research and the magic bestowed on you by your patron give you facility with spells. You cast warlock spells using Charisma.
